author: sky.cactus
content: Missed the call, but I disagree with <@552133098075193354>'s strategy for keeping the TTD secret for a time.  An attacker only needs to know the scheduling, it doesn't need to know the TTD.  If the attacker knows that a secret number has been selected they can turn on their hashpower to cause problems at that point in time.
